official_title: A bill to amend the Shipping Act of 1916.

summary.text: Amends the Shipping Act, 1916, to prohibit any person or organization from entering, or coercing another to enter, into an agreement that requires a common carrier by water or other person subject to such Act not to do business with persons who load, unload, or prepare containers for shipment at locations away from shipping piers or docks.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Shipping Act of 1916.
